name: underscores
description: Hi. I'm a starter theme called _s, or underscores, if you like. I'm a theme meant for hacking so don't use me as a Parent Theme. Instead try turning me into the next, most awesome, WordPress theme out there. That's what I'm here for.
author: Automattic Theme Team

scripts.start: concurrently "rollup -c --watch" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:postcss" "browser-sync start --proxy 'https://zotefoams-phase-2.local/' --port 3001 --https --files 'style.css' --files 'js/bundle.js' --files '**/*.php' --ignore 'node_modules'"
scripts.test: rimraf tests/vrc/results && VRC_DEVICES=desktop-only playwright test tests/vrc/compare-pages.spec.js
scripts.test:all: rimraf tests/vrc/results && VRC_LEVEL=3 VRC_MAX_FAILURES=20 VRC_DEVICES=desktop-only playwright test tests/vrc/compare-pages.spec.js
scripts.bundle: npm run build:production && dir-archiver --src . --dest ../zotefoams.zip --exclude .DS_Store .babelrc.json .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .vscode .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md node_modules package-lock.json package.json phpcs.xml.dist *.map .claude tests docs rollup.config.js .prettierrc playwright.config.js postcss.config.js src composer.json
